page.title: 19LOCK-UP(cont.)+PRIMARY SCH.
page.content:
l823 which is a long time ago. There were two cells inside the lock up. The police house was close to it. People would get put in the lock up if they were noisy or drunk. The last prisoner was Mr. Prince, that was about l9O2. Afterwards it was used to keep bodies in, then after that it was used as a shed by the council. Workmen used to put rakes and things like that inside but they don't anymore.
{TUXFORD COUNTY PRIMARY SCHOOL
In l87O a law said that all children, boys and girls had to go to school. So the people decided to build another school in Tuxford. An architect was asked to draw a picture of what the school was to look like. Then school was to open in l877. It cost Â£5O too much to be built, but the school was
